Question.Subject: If I'm following someone on twitter that are set to private do they see my @replies to them?
Question.Content: If I'm following someone on twitter that are set to private, but they're not following me... Do they see my @replies to them
Question.ChosenAnswer: Nope... here's the official explanation from Twitter: "If your account is protected, we assume that you only want your followers to see your updates. @replies sent to people who aren't following you will not be seen. If you want to interact with everyone on Twitter, you should not protect your account."

Answer.Content: Nope... here's the official explanation from Twitter: "If your account is protected, we assume that you only want your followers to see your updates. @replies sent to people who aren't following you will not be seen. If you want to interact with everyone on Twitter, you should not protect your account."
